Title: NETMESSAGE:We have to restore the power first !
Translation: 我们得先恢复电力供应！

Title: NETMESSAGE:These documents describe the results of experiments conducted on human subjects.
Translation: 这些文件描述了对人体对象进行实验的实验结果。

Title: NETMESSAGE:Looks like they were working on some kind of genetically improved subjets, here.
Translation: 他们好像之前在这里进行某种基因改造项目。

Title: NETMESSAGE:This PC contains a lot of data about a series of genetical experiments called ''Project Chimera''…
Translation: 这台电脑里有一些关于“奇美拉计划”的基因实验的数据。

Title: NETMESSAGE:This case contains viruses samples intended to be used on test subjects.
Translation: 这个柜子里有一些用于实验对象的病毒样本。

Title: NETMESSAGE:We can now get to the labs and search for documents, data... anything we can save from this mess !
Translation: 我们可以去实验室搜集文档、数据…搜集任何能搜集的东西

Title: NETMESSAGE:You must find him before it's too late, we can't let him sell our researches !
Translation: 你得趁早找到他，绝不能让他把我们的研究成果卖出去！

Title: NETMESSAGE:He spread a virus in the ventilation system and escaped\nby the railroad network.
Translation: 他通过通风系统散播了一种病毒\n然后走轨道交通系统逃跑了。

Title: NETMESSAGE:One of the scientists who was working in the genetic labs stole a\ncase of samples, He probably wants to sell it !
Translation: 某个在基因实验室工作的科学家偷了一些样本，他可能想要把样本卖了！

Title: NETMESSAGE:Are you the mercenaries hired to protect our work ?\nI was hiding here since it all started, I saw what happened.
Translation: 你是来保护我们工作的雇佣兵吗？\n从一开始我就躲在这儿，我亲眼目睹了这里发生的一切！
